headline: KKR Completes Acquisition of OSTTRA From S&P Global and CME Group
summary: NEW YORK, October 10, 2025--KKR, a leading global investment firm, today announced that investment funds managed by KKR have completed the acquisition of OSTTRA, a leading provider of post-trade solutions for the global OTC market, from S&P Global and CME Group. The terms of the deal for OSTTRA equaled total enterprise value at $3.1 billion.
